## <span style="color:  #030303;"> `r fontawesome::fa("user", fill = "#030303", prefer_type="solid")` About me</span>

|  |  |
|:------------------------------------------------------------------|
| I'm a post-baccalaureate researcher working on bioinformatics to study brain function and disease, genetic variation, and drug response. My main interest is the development of algorithms to analyze omics data and their application to answer a wide range of biological questions.
